about.title: About me
about.description_1: with experience in building scalable, custom, and product-oriented web solutions. I specialize in
about.description_2: I've worked on projects involving artificial intelligence, automated content generation, personalized diagnostic systems, and the customization of eCommerce platforms. I have experience developing everything from MVPs to complex features, always prioritizing user experience, accessibility, and performance.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer & Diagnostics Experience Engineer
jobs.description: Designed and developed the cosmetic diagnostic web interface with a focus on UX and interactive visualizations. Integrated AI for facial analysis in collaboration with computer vision specialists. Connected the app with external platforms such as Shopify and Klaviyo. Optimized system logic to improve the accuracy of recommendations. Collaborated with multidisciplinary teams and managed technical deliveries in an agile environment.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Implemented accurate web designs based on client specifications. Optimized website performance with a focus on speed and user experience. Applied SEO strategies and web analytics. Adapted functionalities to meet specific requirements. Managed hosting and domains, ensuring system stability.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Designed and implemented high-quality user interfaces using ReactJS. Worked on projects following Figma design guidelines. Collaborated closely with both backend and frontend teams. Optimized frontend templates to enhance performance and efficiency. Applied problem-solving skills to overcome technical challenges.

projects.title: Appointment booking system
projects.description: Appointment system implementing a user portal and a vendor portal, where appointments can be managed and users can communicate with vendors.

projects.title: Consortium management system
projects.description: System for managing consortia, tenants, and PDF invoicing. Includes workflows for automating registrations and document downloads.

projects.title: Talent Forge, a course platform
projects.description: I participated in the creation of a web platform based on the purchase and sale of courses in which I gained knowledge in Figma, Git Flow and managed to implement the Mercado Pago payment gateway to make purchases on the web. I was part of the Frontend section directing its web design, declaring the color palette of the platform and distribution of the components and its responsive design. Using for the creation of the same Javascript, MongoDB, ExpressJS, React JS, CSS and Tailwind
